name: MAGIS
description:
Magis is Dungeon Crawler game made with Unity Engine. The purpose of the game is to reach the end zone without dying and clear the room before going to the next room.

How To Play:

WMove UpAMove LeftSMove DownDMove RightMouse DirectionAimingMouse Left ClickShooting

Author:

Antonio Michael Kurniawan (NIM : 2301924063)

Kenzie Castello Tiopan (NIM: 2301859051)

Vincent Thorian (NIM: 2301886424)

LB04 (Small Class)/ MA04 (Big Class)

Course: Game Programming (GAME6069)
